title: This may amuse only me
author: VD
content_html:
But TIA is already 20 percent longer than Sam Harris’s “marvellous little book”. And I haven’t even begun the serious slashing and burning.

It seems to be going really well so far, although I’m slightly concerned that someone is going to look over my shoulder and ask: “why do you keep typing REDRUM over and over?”

And special thanks to Huck, whose quick finger on the JSTOR trigger kept me from making a stupid mistake and let me keep rolling without pause.
content_text:
But TIA is already 20 percent longer than Sam Harris’s “marvellous little book”.  And I haven’t even begun the serious slashing and burning.
It seems to be going really well so far, although I’m slightly concerned that someone is going to look over my shoulder and ask: “why do you keep typing REDRUM over and over?”
And special thanks to Huck, whose quick finger on the JSTOR trigger kept me from making a stupid mistake and let me keep rolling without pause.
